name: CareerTiger
overview:
CareerTiger provides one-on-one coaching and bootcamp sessions to help experienced professionals and new college grads to find their next job.

Based in the San Francisco Bay Area, we are a network of mentors that are helping new and experienced professionals to find their next gig in tough economic times.

We care deeply about helping professionals with career development.

Simplicity, passion, innovation and execution is at the core of everything we do.

Our Beliefs:

Socially responsible: There is a no better business than one that actually helps people and the community. Helping others is noble, helping others find a job is super noble Innovative: You deserve a better, smart and intelligent way to find you next job Price: Job search help should be affordable Great service: We would rather help one person find a job successfully rather than coaching hundreds of people with no results Respect: Every individual is unique â€“ with his or her unique challenges, skills and experience. Respect for each individual will help us serve better. Our mantra:

Reduce frustration Accelerate job search Deliver measurable results Be available Never cease to smile
